markdownRemark.html:
And yet more update……

1.05+is out, maybe they do some rebalance. Nothing much to say about that. I’ll update this post once I try it out (not now, I’m busy)

More importantly.
The final character will be Nanoha adult ver.

There will also two new mode added, I don’t know what it is though. One of them seems to be netplay exclusively for ppl who have pack installed.
Like i said before, this pack will be released in C75, which is planned for December 28-30, 2008. Unfortunately, I don’t think I’ll be able to get a copy of it on the day of it’s release due to my own holiday somewhere. Well, i can always ask my friend to snatch one for me :3 .

Source(japanese)
